ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The only good dragon...
ygData.msgSnippet: for a while i thought they loaded the bosses for the 1 year eq anniversary. nagafen was weak (scale and 2 orbs) but vox had THREE RBB s, inno had beckon,
ygData.messageBody:
for a while i thought they loaded the bosses for the 1 year eq anniversary.
nagafen was weak (scale and 2 orbs) but vox had THREE RBB's, inno had
beckon, dawnchaser, and the first tunarian scimitar on our server, and noble
dojorn had efreeti gloves, which are really nice for wis casters. and i
didn't care about nag being weak cause that bastage tranix finally dropped
my crown =) we had a great couple days.

Shada Powa, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L48 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> He dropped
> the druid crook, shaman hammer, orb if tishan (I passed),
> gauntlets of fiery might, and *two* cloaks of flames.
>
> --
> John H. Kim
> kim@...
